scripts.deploy-js: npm run build-coffee && npm run browserify
scripts.build:scripts:main: browserify -d src/dist/blog/main.js -p [minifyify --compressPath src/dist/blog --output assets/js/main.js.map] | hashmark -n src/dist/blog/main.js -s -l 8 'assets/js/{name}{ext}'
scripts.build:scripts:post: browserify -d src/dist/post/main.js -p [minifyify --compressPath src/dist/post --output assets/js/main.post.js.map] | hashmark -n src/dist/post/main.js -s -l 8 'assets/js/{name}.post{ext}'
scripts.build:scripts: npm run build:coffee && npm run build:scripts:main && npm run build:scripts:post
scripts.build:scripts:debug: npm run build:scripts:main:debug && npm run build:scripts:post:debug/
scripts.build:css:theme: npm run sass && npm run minify-css
scripts.build:css:post:fb: npm run facebook-post && npm run minify-facebook-post
scripts.build:css:post:ut: npm run unit-test-post && npm run minify-unit-test-post
scripts.build:css:all: npm run build:css:theme && npm run build:css:post:fb && npm run build:css:post:ut
scripts.merge:css:all:
echo '<style>' > partials/css/bundle.hbs && sh -c 'cat assets/css/bundle.min.css >> partials/css/bundle.hbs' && echo '
</style>' >> partials/css/bundle.hbs
scripts.deploy:css:all: npm run build:css:all && npm run merge:css:all
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:css:all && npm run build:scripts
